methods.name: public static boolean isRegionalIndicatorSymbol(int codePoint)
methods.comment: * Returns true if the given code point is regional indicator symbol.

methods.name: public static boolean isEmojiModifier(int codePoint)
methods.comment: * Returns true if the given code point is emoji modifier.

methods.name: public static boolean isEmojiModifierBase(int c)
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the given code point is emoji modifier base.
     * @param c codepoint to check
     * @return true if is emoji modifier base

methods.name: public static boolean isEmoji(int codePoint)
methods.comment: * Returns true if the character has Emoji property.

methods.name: public static boolean isKeycapBase(int codePoint)
methods.comment: Returns true if the character can be a base character of COMBINING ENCLOSING KEYCAP.

methods.name: public static boolean isTagSpecChar(int codePoint)
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the character can be a part of tag_spec in emoji tag sequence.
     *
     * Note that 0xE007F (CANCEL TAG) is not included.
